channel.title: How can you put items in your shop help!
channel.description: Hi i need really big help because i am trying put items into my store for some reason it wont let me

item.title: How can you put items in your shop help!
item.dc:creator: @I_Am_King I Am King
item.description:
@I_Am_King wrote:

To edit a shop:
go to your shop.cfg and find the shop you want to edit and you can change the amout the store has in stock and also the item just change the values

//-----ShopID---ShopName----------------------------------------Sell----Buy-----Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount--Item----Amount

That should be the template Item is the ID of the item Amount is the amount in stock.

(Example: if you put the item as 995, which is a coin and the amount as 1,000,000 when the person went to that store they would see 1,000,000 coins for sell)

Read full topic
item.source: How can you put items in your shop help!
